taskbody.context:
The New wizard enables you to select predefined templates or custom templates. Custom templates are created in previous sessions or by other users.
The list of templates presented in the dialog includes:
Document Types templates - Templates supplied with the defined document types.
User defined templates - You can add template files to the templates folder of the install directory. You can also specify another directory to use for templates. and go to Editor Templates Document Templates to specify a custom templates folder.

step.cmd: Go to menu File New Other oXygen New From Templates .
Type a name for the new document and press the Next button.

taskbody.result: The newly created document already contains the structure and content provided in the template.
